channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec -- all products

item.title: CVE-2016-6587|2024-08-06T01:36:28.039Z -- symantec -- norton%20mobile%20security%20for%20android
item.description: An Information Disclosure vulnerability exists in the mid.dat file stored on the SD card in Symantec Norton Mobile Security for Android before 3.16, which could let a local malicious user obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2016-6591|2024-08-06T01:36:28.656Z -- symantec -- norton%20app%20lock
item.description: A security bypass vulnerability exists in Symantec Norton App Lock 1.0.3.186 and earlier if application pinning is enabled, which could let a local malicious user bypass security restrictions.

item.title: CVE-2016-5311|2024-08-06T01:00:58.618Z -- symantec -- norton%20antivirus%2C%20norton%20antivirus%20with%20backup%2C%20norton%20security%2C%20norton%20security%20with%20backup%2C%20norton%20internet%20security%2C%20norton%20360
item.description: A Privilege Escalation vulnerability exists in Symantec Norton Antivirus, Norton AntiVirus with Backup, Norton Security, Norton Security with Backup, Norton Internet Security, Norton 360, Endpoint Protection Small Business Edition Cloud, and Endpoint Protection Cloud Client due to a DLL-preloading without path restrictions, which could let a local malicious user obtain system privileges.

item.title: CVE-2016-6590|2024-08-06T01:36:28.532Z -- symantec -- it%20management%20suite
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists when loading DLLs during boot up and reboot in Symantec IT Management Suite 8.0 prior to 8.0 HF4 and Suite 7.6 prior to 7.6 HF7, Symantec Ghost Solution Suite 3.1 prior to 3.1 MP4, Symantec Endpoint Virtualization 7.x prior to 7.6 HF7, and Symantec Encryption Desktop 10.x prior to 10.4.1, which could let a local malicious user execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2016-6592|2024-08-06T01:36:28.503Z -- symantec -- norton%20download%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Symantec Norton Download Manager versions prior to 5.6. A remote user can create a specially crafted DLL file that, when placed on the target user's system, will cause the Norton Download Manager component to load the remote user's DLL instead of the intended DLL and execute arbitrary code when the Norton Download Manager component is run by the target user.

item.title: CVE-2016-6589|2024-08-06T01:36:28.254Z -- symantec -- it%20management%20suite
item.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in the ITMS workflow process manager login window in Symantec IT Management Suite 8.0.

item.title: CVE-2016-6588|2024-08-06T01:36:28.224Z -- symantec -- it%20management%20suite
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in the ITMS workflow process manager console in Symantec IT Management Suite 8.0.

item.title: CVE-2016-6593|2024-08-06T01:36:28.442Z -- symantec -- vip%20access%20desktop
item.description: A code-execution vulnerability exists during startup in jhi.dll and otpiha.dll in Symantec VIP Access Desktop before 2.2.2, which could let local malicious users execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2016-6585|2024-08-06T01:36:28.303Z -- symantec -- norton%20mobile%20security%20for%20android
item.description: A Denial of Service vulnerability exists in Symantec Norton Mobile Security for Android prior to 3.16, which could let a remote malicious user conduct a man-in-the-middle attack via specially crafted JavaScript.

item.title: CVE-2016-6586|2024-08-06T01:36:28.512Z -- symantec -- norton%20mobile%20security%20for%20android
item.description: A security bypass vulnerability exists in Symantec Norton Mobile Security for Android before 3.16, which could let a malicious user conduct a man-in-the-middle via specially crafted JavaScript to add arbitrary URLs to the URL whitelist.
